keys: dae (dispositivo automático de entrada) de ensino

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>merli/1173</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Cuando voy, vengo</string>
            <string language="en">When I go, I come</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wenn ich gehe, komme ich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quand je vais, je viens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quando eu vou, eu venho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quando vado, vengo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όταν πηγαίνω, έρχομαι</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva al voltant de les endevinalles. Conté activitats d'autoavaluació: audició, lectura i selecció (Avalua't), i pràctica de lectura per ordenar una endevinalla (Practica).</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on Spanish riddles. It includes self-assessment activities: listening, reading and selection; as well as reading practice to put a riddle in order.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió</string>
            <string language="en">comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material educatiu</string>
            <string language="en">instructional materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">memoritzar</string>
            <string language="en">memorising</string>
            <string language="es">memorización</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material multimèdia</string>
            <string language="en">multimedia material</string>
            <string language="es">material multimedia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">suport a l'ensenyament</string>
            <string language="en">teaching aids</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf spanischen Rätseln. Er schließt Selbstbewertung 
Aktivitäten ein: Hören, lesend und Auswahl; sowie 
Lesepraxis, ein Rätsel in Ordnung einzusetzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur 
des énigmes espagnoles. Elle inclut des activités de 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment : écoute, lisant et sélection ; 
aussi bien que la pratique en matière de lecture de mettre une 
énigme dans la commande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) em 
riddles espanhóis. Inclui atividades do self-assessment: 
escutar, lendo e seleção; as.well.as a prática da 
leitura pôr um riddle em ordem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sui 
riddles spagnoli. Include le attività di valutazione di se 
stesso: ascoltare, leggendo e selezione; così come 
pratica della lettura mettere un riddle nell'ordine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στα 
ισπανικά αινίγματα. Περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες 
αυτοαξιολόγησης: άκουσμα, ανάγνωση και επιλογή  όπως 
και την πρακτική ανάγνωσης να τεθεί ένα αίνιγμα στην κατάταξη.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtsmaterialien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
